Dialogue.Page: Mod: Real Solar System Authors: xen, MegaPiggy, and Trifid
Real Solar System is a recreation of our solar system within Outer Wilds. This mod has been worked on by 3 people.
Starting with xen’s original work adding the planets, notable moons, and the nearby Alpha/Proxima Centauri star system.
MegaPiggy added dwarf planets, more moons, a few satellites, and additional nearby star systems like Barnard’s Star, Luhman 16, and WISE 0855−0714.
Trifid improved planet visuals with better maps, characters, a new skybox, Bramble dimensions, warp stations, a monumental number of satellites, and the Sirius AB system.
Even without its abandoned story plans, RSS is still a lot of fun to fly around. Getting to see our solar system in Outer Wilds in a neat experience, and well worth the download.
